Hands down THE BEST MEAL we had in Barcelona.  This was also the best tapas meal I've ever had in my life and that is a bold statement coming from me, Mrs Piggy, who has eaten a lot in my lifetime ;).Meat Ball Bombs-  Crispy on the outside, warm and creamy on the inside.Burrata- Creamy burrata with sweet tomato slicesHoney Mustard Ribs-- MY FAVORITE DISH from Tapeo.. Ordered seconds!Chocolate Creme with Salt and Olive Oil-  I still dream of this dessert!Stuffed Squid-- So soft it just melts in your mouth.  Yes, it was THAT good.We went to a lot of different restaurants in Barcelona but this by far, stands out as one of the best meals I've ever had.  The honey mustard ribs..... my mouth waters every time I think of those.  The waiters are informative and have great recommendations.  There were 4 of us who ate lunch there.  With food and drinks, it came out to 100 euros.  This was VERY reasonable, considering we ate enough food for 6-7 people.
